verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> thou art <S%G1488><s%> without excuse <S%G379><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, whosoever thou art <S%G3956><s%> that judgest <S%G2919><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> wherein1722, 3739 thou judges <S%G2919><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>, thou condemnest <S%G2632><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> thou <S%G846><s%> that judgest <S%G2919><s%> dost practise the same things <S%G4238><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> them that practise <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> reckonest <S%G3049><s%> thou this <S%G5124><s%>, O <S%G5599><s%> man <S%G444><s%>, who judgest <S%G2919><s%> them that practise <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> doest <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G846><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> shalt escape <S%G1628><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

Or <S%G2228><s%> despisest <S%G2706><s%> thou the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> goodness <S%G5544><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> forbearance <S%G463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> longsuffering <S%G3115><s%>, not knowing <S%G50><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the goodness <S%G5543><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> leadeth <S%G71><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance <S%G3341><s%>?

but <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> hardness <S%G4643><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> impenitent <S%G279><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> treasurest up <S%G2343><s%> for thyself <S%G4572><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of wrath <S%G3709><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%> of the righteous judgment <S%G1341><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>;
who <S%G3739><s%> will render <S%G591><s%> to every man <S%G1538><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%>:

to them <S%G3588><s%> that by <S%G2596><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> in <S%G18><s%> well-doing <S%G2041><s%> seek for <S%G2212><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> incorruption <S%G861><s%>, eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> unto them <S%G3588><s%> that are factious <S%G2052><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> obey <S%G544><s%> not the truth <S%G225><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> obey <S%G3982><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%>, shall be wrath <S%G3709><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> indignation <S%G2372><s%>,

tribulation <S%G2347><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> anguish <S%G4730><s%>, upon <S%G1909><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> that worketh <S%G2716><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>, of the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the Greek <S%G1672><s%>;

but <S%G1161><s%> glory <S%G2532><s%> and honor <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> to every man <S%G3956><s%> that worketh <S%G2038><s%> good <S%G18><s%>, to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first <S%G4412><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the Greek <S%G1672><s%>:
for <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> respect of persons <S%G4382><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%> without law <S%G460><s%> shall <S%G622><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> without the law <S%G460><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%> under <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> shall be judged <S%G2919><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>;

for <S%G1063><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the hearers <S%G202><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> are just <S%G1342><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the doers <S%G4163><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> shall be justified <S%G1344><s%>:

(for <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> that have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> by nature <S%G5449><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, these <S%G3778><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, are <S%G1526><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> unto themselves <S%G1438><s%>;

in that <S%G3748><s%> they show <S%G1731><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> written <S%G1123><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%>, their <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> bearing witness <S%G4828><s%> therewith <S%G2532><s%>, and their thoughts <S%G3053><s%> one <S%G3342><s%> with another <S%G240><s%> accusing <S%G2723><s%> or else2228, 2532 excusing them <S%G626><s%>);

in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> shall judge <S%G2919><s%> the secrets <S%G2927><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, according <S%G2596><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%>, by <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

But <S%G1492><s%> if thou <S%G4771><s%> bearest the name <S%G2028><s%> of a Jew <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> restest <S%G1879><s%> upon the law <S%G3551><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> gloriest <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> knowest <S%G1097><s%> his will <S%G2307><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> approvest <S%G1381><s%> the things that are excellent <S%G1308><s%>, being instructed <S%G2727><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>,

and <S%G5037><s%> art confident that <S%G3982><s%> thou thyself <S%G4572><s%> art <S%G1511><s%> a guide <S%G3595><s%> of the blind <S%G5185><s%>, a light <S%G5457><s%> of them <S%G3588><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%>,

a corrector <S%G3810><s%> of the foolish <S%G878><s%>, a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of babes <S%G3516><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> the form <S%G3446><s%> of knowledge <S%G1108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%>;

thou <S%G3588><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> that teachest <S%G1321><s%> another <S%G2087><s%>, teachest thou <S%G1321><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>? thou that preachest <S%G2784><s%> a man should not <S%G3361><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%>, dost thou steal <S%G2813><s%>?

thou that sayest <S%G3004><s%> a man should not <S%G3361><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>, dost thou commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>? thou that abhorrest <S%G948><s%> idols <S%G1497><s%>, dost thou rob temples <S%G2416><s%>?

thou who <S%G3739><s%> gloriest <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, through <S%G1223><s%> thy transgression <S%G3847><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> dishonorest thou <S%G818><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is blasphemed <S%G987><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of you <S%G5209><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> it is written <S%G1125><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> profiteth <S%G5623><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> thou be a doer <S%G4238><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thou be <S%G1510><s%> a transgressor <S%G3848><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, thy <S%G4675><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is become <S%G1096><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%>.

If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> the ordinances <S%G1345><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>, shall not <S%G3780><s%> his <S%G846><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> be reckoned <S%G3049><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%>?

and <S%G2532><s%> shall not <S%G2919><s%> the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> which is by <S%G1537><s%> nature <S%G5449><s%>, if it fulfil <S%G5055><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>, judge <S%G2919><s%> thee <S%G4571><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> the letter <S%G1121><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> art a transgressor <S%G3848><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%> who is one3588, 1722 outwardly <S%G5318><s%>; neither <S%G3761><s%> is that circumcision <S%G1722><s%> which is outward <S%G5318><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> is a Jew <S%G2453><s%> who is one3588, 1722 inwardly <S%G2927><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is that of the heart <S%G2588><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in the letter <S%G1121><s%>; whose <S%G3739><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.
